title: Higher Returns Are Now Available for Investors with Citibank's Structured Notes
summary: Bucharest - Citibank continues to expand its global investments offering for retail customers in Romania with newly-launched structured notes. These products respond to customers' needs for diversification into different asset classes, sectors, geographies and themes to which they may not seek to have direct exposure.
tag-1: Higher Returns Are Now Available for Investors with Citibank's Structured Notes
tag-3: Bucharest – Citibank continues to expand its global investments offering for retail customers in Romania with newly-launched structured notes. These products respond to customers' needs for diversification into different asset classes, sectors, geographies and themes to which they may not seek to have direct exposure.
tag-4: Structured notes are meeting our client's specific financial needs in a way that cannot be met by the standardized financial instruments available in the markets, thus offering the possibility of higher returns and in some situations, up to 100 percent capital protection. Tenures are generally between one and five years, depending on the client's investment horizon and risk profile.
tag-5: "The launch of this class of structured products clearly demonstrates Citibank Romania's commitment to offer innovative wealth management products that meet the requirements of our clients," said Luis Tomassoni, Retail Bank Head at Citibank Romania. "With the growth in the mass affluent population in Central and Eastern Europe, we believe that many customers in Romania are looking for a complete wealth management service.
tag-6: "Structured notes can be customized to meet the unique investment objectives of investors and our Relationship Managers are all investment qualified and help our clients develop wealth-management strategies that best fit their circumstances and financial needs. Whether they want to take an aggressive investment approach, or have a more cautious outlook we can use our range of products and expertise to help them."
tag-7: As compared to other similar offers available on the market, the structured notes are available at Citibank starting from as low as US$10,000.
tag-8: Investment products are not bank deposits; are not guaranteed by any government agency or through any deposit guarantee scheme. Investment products are not guaranteed by Citibank Europe plc. Dublin – Romania branch or by any of its subsidiaries or affiliates directly or indirectly controlled by Citigroup. Investment products are exposed to, among other risks, the risk of losing partially or totally the invested capital. Past performance is not a guarantee for future performance and value of investment products can fluctuate. Investment products denominated in foreign currency are also exposed to the foreign exchange risk that can lead to a loss of the capital invested. In accordance with Citi internal policy, investment products shall not be offered to natural persons who are residents of: i) USA (American citizen or holder of a Green Card or resident in USA for fiscal purposes); ii) Ireland (Irish citizen, or resident in Ireland for fiscal purposes, who are in Ireland when the transaction with the securities distributed by Citibank Europe plc., Dublin – Romanian Subsidiary takes place; iii) Australia (Australian citizen, who is on Australian territory when the transaction with securities takes place.
